plot outline: The story is about the real estate business happening in Kerala focusing on the city of Calicut. Surendran (Prithviraj) is the central character of the movie, who happens to be a jobless young guy, who try to make fortunes by real estate market. CH (Tini Tom) act as a partner for his business. Beena (Rima Kallingal) plays as the lady love of Surnedran in the movie. The movie is been directed by Renjith. There is good line of famous actors in the movie, like veteran actor, Achuta menon(Thilakan) who plays a key role and Golden Pappan( Jagathi Sreekumar). The story starts to move when Achuta Menon comes to surendrans office for selling a property. Its infact owned by his first wife. The deal goes for a toss as Achuta Menons son interfere. Achuta Menon becomes a partner for Surendrans business and fortunes starts to change for Surendran. The Movie infact clearly shows how real estate business works and what could happen to people look for easy money through real estate. Credit should go for Director Renjith at first and excellent performance by actors Thilakan, Jagathy Sreekumar and Prithviraj.
title: Indian Rupee
plot: An unemployed youth Jayaprakash, dreams big fortunes in the field of real estate business, and therefore, faces a lot of obstacles in the path towards his goal.

The story is about the real estate business happening in Kerala focusing on the city of Calicut. Surendran (Prithviraj) is the central character of the movie, who happens to be a jobless young guy, who try to make fortunes by real estate market. CH (Tini Tom) act as a partner for his business. Beena (Rima Kallingal) plays as the lady love of Surnedran in the movie. The movie is been directed by Renjith. There is good line of famous actors in the movie, like veteran actor, Achuta menon(Thilakan) who plays a key role and Golden Pappan( Jagathi Sreekumar). The story starts to move when Achuta Menon comes to surendrans office for selling a property. Its infact owned by his first wife. The deal goes for a toss as Achuta Menons son interfere. Achuta Menon becomes a partner for Surendrans business and fortunes starts to change for Surendran. The Movie infact clearly shows how real estate business works and what could happen to people look for easy money through real estate. Credit should go for Director Renjith at first and excellent performance by actors Thilakan, Jagathy Sreekumar and Prithviraj.::Arun Varghese E

_Indian Rupee_ (qv) is a satirical dig on today's youth who attempt to make quick money without sweating it out. Prithviraj is a small time real estate dealer based in Kozhikode, who dreams of making it big some day. Prithviraj is in love with his Rima Kallingal, who is a doctor, though her parents are yet to approve their alliance. Prithviraj along with his friend (Tini Tom) is scouting for a land deal. He works under a senior agent (Mamukoya) but wishes to break free as soon as possible. He sees light at the end of the tunnel, when Thilakan, an old city dweller approaches him to sell off his land assets. The deal never happens, but Thilakan stays back with them. Prithviraj manages to earn a decent fortune after some smart moves, but he learns some valuable lessons in the process, about the importance of earning money honestly in life.::Anonymous
